text: The Order of Time () is a book by Italian physicist Carlo Rovelli. It is about time in physics.. Carlo Rovelli is the leading scientist who writes about "warped time" and at the forefront of physicist who are trying to unify theory of relativity and loop quantum gravity theory . An audiobook, four hours and nineteen minutes long, was read by Benedict Cumberbatch. ==References== Category:2017 non-fiction books Category:Penguin Books books Category:Italian non-fiction books Category:Physics books
